<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armloadstoreopt">ARMLoadStoreOpt</a></>}>
Post- register allocation pass the combine load / store instructions to form ldm / stm instructions. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armloadstoreopt/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armloadstoreopt/memopqueueentry">MemOpQueueEntry</a></>}>
A set of load/store MachineInstrs with same base register sorted by offset. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armloadstoreopt/memopqueueentry/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armloadstoreopt/mergecandidate">MergeCandidate</a></>}>
A set of MachineInstrs that fulfill (nearly all) conditions to get merged into a LDM/STM. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armloadstoreopt/mergecandidate/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armpreallocloadstoreopt">ARMPreAllocLoadStoreOpt</a></>}>
Pre- register allocation pass that move load / stores from consecutive locations close to make it more likely they will be combined later. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/armpreallocloadstoreopt/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

### AssumeMisalignedLoadStores {#afb2cebe29db5440571443025aed30cfa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>cl::opt&lt; bool &gt; AssumeMisalignedLoadStores(&quot;arm-assume-misaligned-load-store&quot;, cl::Hidden, cl::init(false), cl::desc(&quot;Be more conservative in ARM load/store opt&quot;))</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This switch disables formation of double/multi instructions that could potentially lead to (new) alignment traps even with CCR.UNALIGN&#95;TRP disabled.

This can be used to create libraries that are robust even when users provoke undefined behaviour by supplying misaligned pointers. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="#abe37f7fd8489575acc84929596ba4ead">mayCombineMisaligned()</a>
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="#l00092">92</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp">ARMLoadStoreOptimizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This switch disables formation of double/multi instructions that could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// potentially lead to (new) alignment traps even with CCR.UNALIGN&#95;TRP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// disabled. This can be used to create libraries that are robust even when</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!MO.isReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (MO.isDef() &amp;&amp; MO.getReg() == ARM::CPSR &amp;&amp; !MO.isDead())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the instruction has live CPSR def, then it&#39;s not safe to fold it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into load / store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsLoad || IsStore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loads and stores with immediate offsets can be updated, but only if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the new offset isn&#39;t negative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The MachineOperand containing the offset immediate is the last one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before predicates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getDesc().getNumOperands() - 3);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offsets are scaled by 1, 2 or 4 depending on the Opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>() - WordOffset &#42; <a href="#ac5a0f1a617bc1fd0b0e88f87c6089d57">getImmScale</a>(Opc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If storing the base register, it needs to be reset first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> InstrSrcReg = <a href="#af179491eb2fd3d25555062d94fedf00a">getLoadStoreRegOp</a>(&#42;MBBI).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; !(IsStore &amp;&amp; InstrSrcReg == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a2feaa1c69335c6b9028076cd68c7a5f5">setImm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InsertSub = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Opc == ARM::tSUBi8 || Opc == ARM::tADDi8) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 !definesCPSR(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SUBS/ADDS using this register, with a dead def of the CPSR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge it with the update; if the merged offset is too large,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert a new sub instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getDesc().getNumOperands() - 3);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = (Opc == ARM::tSUBi8) ?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>() + WordOffset &#42; 4 :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>() - WordOffset &#42; 4 ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; TL-&gt;isLegalAddImmediate(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Swap ADDS&lt;-&gt;SUBS if Offset &lt; 0, erase instruction if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Offset == 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a2feaa1c69335c6b9028076cd68c7a5f5">setImm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The base register has now been reset, so exit early.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InsertSub = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t update the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InsertSub = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (definesCPSR(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;isCall() || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;isBranch()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since SUBS sets the condition flags, we can&#39;t place the base reset</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute live registers just before instruction \\p Before (in normal schedule</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Opcode)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if a Thumb1 LDM/STM merge is safe. This is the case if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - There is no writeback (LDM of base register),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - the base register is killed by the merged instruction,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - or it&#39;s safe to overwrite the condition flags, i.e. to insert a SUBS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   to reset the base register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, don&#39;t merge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s safe to return here since the code to materialize a new base register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// above is also conditional on SafeToClobberCPSR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isThumb1 &amp;&amp; !SafeToClobberCPSR &amp;&amp; Writeback &amp;&amp; !BaseKill)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge following instructions where possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = SIndex+1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; EIndex; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewOffset != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if the current load/store may be part of a multi load/store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegNum = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a1255befbcd6e034394681b1bcd3529ff">isUndef</a>() ? std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max()</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PartOfLSMulti = CanMergeToLSMulti;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PartOfLSMulti) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Register numbers must be in ascending order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegNum &lt;= PRegNum)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PartOfLSMulti = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VFP / NEON load/store multiples, the registers must be</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If this is a exit BB, try merging the return ops (&quot;bx lr&quot; and &quot;mov pc, lr&quot;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into the preceding stack restore so it directly restore the value of LR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into pc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ldmfd sp!, &#123;..., lr&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   bx lr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ldmfd sp!, &#123;..., lr&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   mov pc, lr</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2621"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reschedule DBG&#95;VALUEs to match any loads that were moved. When a load is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sunk beyond a DBG&#95;VALUE that is referring to it, the DBG&#95;VALUE becomes a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use-before-def, resulting in a loss of debug info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2625"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before the Pre Register Allocation Load Store Pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inst&#95;a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inst&#95;b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %2, &quot;x&quot;, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2633"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After the Pass:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inst&#95;a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inst&#95;b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %2, &quot;x&quot;, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2640"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The code below addresses this by moving the DBG&#95;VALUE to the position</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediately after the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2643"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After the code below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inst&#95;a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inst&#95;b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %2, &quot;x&quot;, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2651"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm works in two phases: First RescheduleOps() populates the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RegisterMap with registers that were moved as keys, there is no value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserted. In the next phase, every MachineInstr in a basic block is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterated over. If it is a valid DBG&#95;VALUE or DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LIST and it uses one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or more registers in the RegisterMap, the RegisterMap and InstrMap are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// populated with the MachineInstr. If the DBG&#95;VALUE or DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LIST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// describes debug information for a variable that already exists in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgValueSinkCandidates, the MachineInstr in the DbgValueSinkCandidates must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be set to undef. If the current MachineInstr is a load that was moved,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undef the corresponding DBG&#95;VALUE or DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LIST and clone it to below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2663"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To illustrate the above algorithm visually let&#39;s take this example.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2665"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before the Pre Register Allocation Load Store Pass:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %2, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After Pre Register Allocation Load Store Pass:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %2, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2681"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm below does the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2683"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the beginning, the RegisterMap will have been populated with the virtual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers %2, and %3, the DbgValueSinkCandidates and the InstrMap will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// empty. DbgValueSinkCandidates = &#123;&#125;, RegisterMap = &#123;2 -&gt; &#123;&#125;, 3 -&gt; &#123;&#125;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InstrMap &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt; DBG&#95;VALUE %2, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After the first DBG&#95;VALUE (denoted with an X) is processed, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgValueSinkCandidates and InstrMap will be populated and the RegisterMap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entry for %2 will be populated as well. DbgValueSinkCandidates = &#123;A -&gt; X&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RegisterMap = &#123;2 -&gt; &#123;X&#125;, 3 -&gt; &#123;&#125;&#125;, InstrMap &#123;X -&gt; 2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %2, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt; DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2705"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After the DBG&#95;VALUE Y is processed, the DbgValueSinkCandidates is updated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to now hold Y for A and the RegisterMap is also updated to remove X from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2, this is because both X and Y describe the same debug variable A. X is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also updated to have a $noreg as the first operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgValueSinkCandidates = &#123;A -&gt; &#123;Y&#125;&#125;, RegisterMap = &#123;2 -&gt; &#123;&#125;, 3 -&gt; &#123;&#125;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InstrMap = &#123;X-&gt; 2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2712"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE $noreg, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2713"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt; DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2718"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After DBG&#95;VALUE Z is processed, the DbgValueSinkCandidates is updated to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hold Z fr A, the RegisterMap is updated to hold Z for %3, and the InstrMap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is updated to have Z mapped to %3. This is again because Z describes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// debug variable A, Y is not updated to have $noreg as first operand because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its first operand is an immediate, not a register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgValueSinkCandidates = &#123;A -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;, RegisterMap = &#123;2 -&gt; &#123;&#125;, 3 -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InstrMap = &#123;X -&gt; 2, Z -&gt; 3&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE $noreg, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt; %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2730"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2732"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nothing happens here since the RegisterMap for %2 contains no value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgValueSinkCandidates = &#123;A -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;, RegisterMap = &#123;2 -&gt; &#123;&#125;, 3 -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InstrMap = &#123;X -&gt; 2, Z -&gt; 3&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2736"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE $noreg, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2739"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt; %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2742"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the RegisterMap contains Z as a value for %3, the MachineInstr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer Z is copied to come after the load for %3 and the old Z&#39;s first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand is changed to $noreg the Basic Block iterator is moved to after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE Z&#39;s new position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgValueSinkCandidates = &#123;A -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;, RegisterMap = &#123;2 -&gt; &#123;&#125;, 3 -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InstrMap = &#123;X -&gt; 2, Z -&gt; 3&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE $noreg, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE $noreg, A, ..., # Old Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt; %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2756"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nothing happens for %4 and the algorithm exits having processed the entire</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Basic Block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgValueSinkCandidates = &#123;A -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;, RegisterMap = &#123;2 -&gt; &#123;&#125;, 3 -&gt; &#123;Z&#125;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InstrMap = &#123;X -&gt; 2, Z -&gt; 3&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE $noreg, A, .... # X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE 0, A, ... # Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE $noreg, A, ..., # Old Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %2 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE %3, A, ..., # Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %4 = ld ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2768"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This map is used to track the relationship between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a Debug Variable and the DBG&#95;VALUE MachineInstr pointer that describes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// debug information for that Debug Variable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;DebugVariable, MachineInstr &#42;, 8&gt;</a> DbgValueSinkCandidates;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This map is used to track the relationship between a DBG&#95;VALUE or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LIST MachineInstr pointer and Registers that it uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, SmallVector&lt;Register&gt;</a>, 8&gt; InstrMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;end(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2777"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2778"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2984"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2985"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given a memory access Opcode, check that the give Imm would be a valid Offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2986"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for this instruction (same as isLegalAddressImm), Or if the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2987"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could be easily converted to one where that was valid. For example converting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2988"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t2LDRi12 to t2LDRi8 for negative offsets. Works in conjunction with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2989"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AdjustBaseAndOffset below.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unhandled createPostIncLoadStore&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3121"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given a Base Register, optimise the load/store uses to attempt to create more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// post-inc accesses and less register moves. We do this by taking zero offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loads/stores with an add, and convert them to a postinc load/store of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same type. Any subsequent accesses will be adjusted to use and account for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the post-inc value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LDR #0            LDR&#95;POSTINC #16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LDR #4            LDR #-12</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LDR #8            LDR #-8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LDR #12           LDR #-4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ADD #16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At the same time if we do not find an increment but do find an existing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pre/post inc instruction, we can still adjust the offsets of subsequent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions to save the register move that would otherwise be needed for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in-place increment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3139"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ARMPreAllocLoadStoreOpt::DistributeIncrements(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other offsets after the BaseAccess. We rely on either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dominates(BaseAccess, OtherAccess) or dominates(OtherAccess, BaseAccess)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This also adds a simple codesize metric, to detect if an instruction (like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t2LDRBi12) which can often be shrunk to a thumb1 instruction (tLDRBi)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot because it is converted to something else (t2LDRBi8). We start this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at -1 for the gain from removing the increment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 4&gt;</a> SuccessorAccesses;</span></CodeLine>
